item.title: 中国推出促进并购重组的新措施
item.description: 中国证券监管机构推出了促进上市公司兼并和重组的新指导方针，这是中国政府为刺激下行经济而推出的最新刺激计划的一部分。【原文：China’s securities regulator rolled out new guidelines to promote mergers and restructuring among listed companies as part of Beijing’s latest stimulus package to bolster the sagging economy.】

item.title: 肯尼亚高等法院裁定私有化法违宪
item.description: 肯尼亚高等法院裁定该国的私有化法律违宪，这是东非政府在资金来源多元化方面遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：A Kenyan high court ruled that the nation’s privatization law is unconstitutional, the latest setback for the East African government that’s hard-pressed to diversify funding sources.】

item.title: 提供股票买卖建议的聊天机器人获得以色列批准
item.description:
其他国家的政府已经发出警报，人工智能可能会破坏金融市场的稳定。【原文：

Other governments have raised alarms that artificial intelligence might destabilize financial markets.

】

item.title: Blackstone 与 Vista 达成 84 亿美元收购 Smartsheet 的交易
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 和 Vista Equity Partners 已同意以约 84 亿美元的价格收购软件提供商 Smartsheet Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc. and Vista Equity Partners have agreed to acquire software provider Smartsheet Inc. for about $8.4 billion in one of the year’s largest take-private deals.】

item.title: 纽约时报》将为《每日新闻》等节目推出播客订阅计划
item.description:
该产品每月收费 6 美元，每年收费 50 美元，供尚未订阅新闻捆绑包的用户收听热门节目的过往 剧集。【原文：

The offering will cost $6 a month, or $50 a year, to listen to past episodes of popular titles for people who don’t already subscribe to news bundles.

】

item.title: 意大利准备出售邮政股份以筹集约 24 亿欧元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）正准备出售意大利邮政公司（Poste Italiane SpA）多达 15%的股份，作为旨在削减该国巨额债务的私有化行动的一部分。【原文：Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni is preparing to sell as much as 15% of Poste Italiane SpA as part of a privatization drive aimed at cutting the country’s mammoth debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 希腊力争在四年内将债务降至2009年以来最低水平
item.description: 希腊财政部长表示，希腊的目标是在短短四年内将其债务削减约20个百分点，这是希腊摆脱长达十年之久的危机的又一个里程碑。【原文：Greece aims to cut about 20 percentage points from its debt pile within just four years in another milestone in the escape from its decade-long crisis, the country’s finance minister said.】

item.title: 派拉蒙在裁员计划中裁减更多职位
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周二裁减了更多的工作岗位，这也是该公司此前宣布的削减 15%（约 2000 个职位）美国员工计划的一部分。【原文：Paramount Global cut more jobs on Tuesday as part of a previously announced plan to reduce its US workforce by 15%, or about 2,000 positions.】

item.title: Trafigura 任命天然气大亨霍尔图姆为首席执行官，这是其第二任继任者
item.description: Trafigura 集团任命天然气、电力和可再生能源部门主管理查德-霍尔特姆（Richard Holtum）为新任首席执行官，接替杰里米-威尔（Jeremy Weir），后者将继续担任这家大宗商品贸易巨头的董事长。【原文：Trafigura Group has appointed gas, power and renewables head Richard Holtum as its new chief executive officer, replacing Jeremy Weir who will remain chairman of the commodity trading giant.】

item.title: 即使智能电视普及，Roku 仍将 "坚定不移 "地发展机顶盒
item.description: Roku 公司表示，即使在电子行业向内置流媒体技术的智能电视转型之际，该公司仍将 "坚定不移地 "发展其同名机顶盒。【原文：Roku Inc. said the company remains “very committed” to its namesake set-top boxes, even as the electronics industry shifts to smart televisions with built-in streaming technology.】

item.title: 覆盆子 PI 反弹打破伦敦 IPO 令人失望的趋势
item.description: 树莓派控股公司（Raspberry PI Holdings Plc）在报告销售额跃升后股价大涨，巩固了该电脑制造商在伦敦证券交易所近期上市潮中唯一赢家的地位。【原文：Raspberry PI Holdings Plc shares rallied after reporting a jump in sales, cementing the computer maker’s status as the only winner from a recent wave of listings on the London Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 卡斯尔莱克公司获得 10 亿美元贷款，用于购买 60 多架飞机
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，另类投资公司 Castlelake LP 已获得超过 10 亿美元的融资，用于购买 60 多架飞机。【原文：Alternative investment firm Castlelake LP has secured more than $1 billion of financing for its purchase of over 60 aircraft, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 加拿大极端天气造成创纪录的 57 亿美元保险损失
item.description: 在短短两个月内，四次自然灾害给加拿大各地造成了 71 亿加元（53 亿美元）的保险损失，超过了有记录以来的任何一个夏季。【原文：An onslaught of four natural disasters caused C$7.1 billion ($5.3 billion) of insured losses across Canada in just two months — more than any other summer on record.】

item.title: 晨星公司称，资产所有者发现 ESG 越来越 "重要
item.description: 在过去两年的大部分时间里，反对 ESG 相关战略的声浪日益高涨。【原文：For much of the past two years, the pushback against ESG-related strategies has been gaining momentum.】

item.title: 美达股票多头期待 "连接 "事件成为下一轮反弹催化剂
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. 的投资者已经度过了收获颇丰的一年。现在，他们将目光投向了本周的一项活动，希望从中了解该股破纪录涨势的下一步走向。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. investors have already had a rewarding year. Now, their attention is on an event this week for insights into where the stock’s record-breaking rally is heading next.】

item.title: 欧洲炼油厂裁员显示工业正在衰落
item.description:
在监管压力、经济和竞争的共同作用下，企业不得不做出改变，并有可能进一步关闭或缩减业务。【原文：

A combination of regulatory pressure, economics and competition is forcing change, and further moves to close or scale back operations are likely.

】

item.title: 贷款人为赛诺菲健康部门收购计划筹集超过 100 亿欧元资金
item.description: 银行和其他贷款机构正在排队准备100多亿欧元（111亿美元）的债务，以支持赛诺菲（Sanofi SA）消费者健康部门的收购，今年最炙手可热的销售活动之一已进入最后阶段。【原文：Banks and other lenders are lining up more than €10 billion ($11.1 billion) of debt to back a buyout of Sanofi SA’s consumer health division, as one of the most hotly-anticipated sales of the year reaches its final stages.】

item.title: 全球失衡加剧，迈阿密居瑞银房地产泡沫风险之首
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的一份报告显示，即使全球房地产失衡现象有所缓解，包括迈阿密和波士顿在内的美国城市房地产市场泡沫形成的风险仍然很高或不断上升。【原文：US cities including Miami and Boston are seeing high or rising risk of bubbles forming in their real estate markets even as global property imbalances decline, according to a report by UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 华为三合一智能手机挑战可折叠工程极限
item.description: 我亲手体验了华为的 Mate XT 设备，这是一款 10 英寸平板电脑，可折叠成厚重的智能手机大小。但首先...【原文：I laid my hands on Huawei’s Mate XT device, a 10-inch tablet that folds down to the size of a chunky smartphone. But first...】

item.title: Sila 纳米技术公司最新一轮融资估值削减 10 亿美元
item.description:
尽管市场出现了生机勃勃的迹象，但初创企业的首轮融资已变得越来越普遍。【原文：

Startup down rounds have become more common, though there are signs of life in the market. 

】

item.title: 穆迪称美国债务动态 "与 Aaa 评级不符
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）在周二发布的一份报告中警告说，下一届美国政府 "必须努力应对不断扩大的预算赤字"，而这距离该公司宣布对美国主权信用状况作出负面展望已经过去了近一年时间。【原文：The next US administration “must grapple with widening budget deficits,” warned Moody’s Ratings in a report published Tuesday, nearly a year after it announced a negative outlook for the country’s sovereign credit profile.】

item.title: 瑞典央行将无视美联储的领导，暂时保持 "渐进 "策略
item.description: 瑞典央行本周可能会保持自己稳定的宽松步伐，而不会像美联储那样将借贷成本大幅下调半个百分点。【原文：The Riksbank will probably keep to its own steady pace of easing this week and shirk from a bigger half-point reduction in borrowing costs like the one just made by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 谷歌云与研究单位合作加速人工智能开发
item.description: 谷歌表示，由于云计算部门与人工智能研究实验室之间的合作更加紧密，谷歌在人工智能领域取得了更快的进展。【原文：Google said it has seen faster progress in artificial intelligence as a result of closer collaboration between its cloud computing unit and its AI research lab.】

item.title: 刺激政策助长乐观情绪，欧洲依赖中国的行业大幅增长
item.description: 在中国政府宣布了振兴世界第二大经济体的一揽子刺激措施后，因中国经济放缓而备受关注的欧洲股市周二强劲反弹。【原文：European stocks at the forefront of concerns over a slowdown in China rallied strongly on Tuesday, after Beijing announced a package of stimulus measures to revive the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: Snap 将谷歌的生成式人工智能模型整合到聊天机器人中
item.description: Snap公司将开始使用谷歌的生成式人工智能模型来帮助Snapchat的人工智能聊天机器人，这也是Snapchat提高用户参与度和增加用户在这款信息应用上使用时间的更广泛计划的一部分。【原文：Snap Inc. will start using Google’s generative artificial intelligence model to help power Snapchat’s AI chatbot, part of a broader plan to boost engagement and increase user time spent on the messaging app.】

item.title: Northvolt 聘请咨询公司 Teneo 解决资金紧张问题
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞典的 Northvolt AB 公司已聘请咨询公司 Teneo 提供重组建议，包括在这家有债务支持的电池制造商无法与贷款方达成修订条款时的应急计划。【原文：Sweden’s Northvolt AB has hired consulting firm Teneo for restructuring advice, including contingency planning should the debt-backed battery maker fail to reach revised terms with lenders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。来自中国的政策突袭、美联储官员对利率的暗示以及波音公司的最新薪资待遇，这些都在牵动着市场的神经。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. A policy blitz from China, hints on rates from Fed officials and Boeing’s latest pay offer. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒称不排除十月减息的可能，但数据匮乏
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒并不 "完全 "排除下月再次降息的可能性，但他认为决策者可能缺乏足够的数据来对该地区陷入困境的经济做出明确判断。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Madis Muller isn’t “totally” ruling out another interest-rate cut next month but reckons policymakers may lack sufficient data to make definitive judgments on the region’s struggling economy.】

item.title: 德意志银行将聘请 Moelis 的马祖姆德负责印度交易
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）在印度聘用了 Apurva Mazumder，以继续在亚太地区拓展其投资银行业务。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has hired Apurva Mazumder in India as the German lender continues to expand its investment banking business across the Asia Pacific region.】

item.title: 土耳其搁置对股票和加密货币市场收益征税的计划
item.description: 土耳其副总统杰夫代特-伊尔马兹（Cevdet Yilmaz）表示，土耳其今年不考虑额外的税收方案，排除了对股票交易或加密货币利润征税的可能性。【原文：Turkey is not considering an additional tax package for this year, Vice President Cevdet Yilmaz said, ruling out a levy on profits from stocks trading or cryptocurrencies.】
